item.title: Testscape server name
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

First open client.java and where it say import ---- and there will be a whole list of other import stuff delete that and replace it with

import java.io.*; import java.util.*; import java.text.*; import java.util.StringTokenizer; import java.util.Calendar; import java.util.GregorianCalendar; import java.security.*;

Then where it sayâ€™s

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
At the end of the

{

Press enter and add this

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@yel@ EiltePK!", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); String date = sdf.format(new Date()); sendFrame126("@red@" + date, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

Change ElitePK to ur server

Then search for

// is being called regularily every 500ms

And add this in there.

		writePlayers();
